function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of gated communities may create a false sense of security and lead to decreased vigilance in disease prevention measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the community.","Mitigation":"Increase public health education within the community and promote adherence to preventive measures.","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms for education and awareness campaigns.","People":"Residents of gated communities.","Owner":"Community administrators and local health authorities."},{"Description":"Concentration of individuals in gated communities may lead to rapid spread of contagious diseases if preventive measures are not strictly enforced.","Impact":"Severe disease outbreaks within the community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, routine testing, and contact tracing within the community.","Technologies":"Contactless temperature scanners, testing kits, and digital contact tracing apps.","People":"Residents of gated communities.","Owner":"Community administrators and local health authorities."},{"Description":"Limited access to healthcare facilities within gated communities may result in delayed diagnosis and treatment of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased severity of illnesses and higher mortality rates within the community.","Mitigation":"Improve healthcare infrastructure within the community and provide access to telemedicine services.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms and remote monitoring devices.","People":"Residents of gated communities.","Owner":"Community administrators and local health authorities."}]}
